string.value: Who is the Owner of the Mysterious Note?
While talking to Mu Young, you were suddenly transported to a foreign place and a Jr. Balrog appeared right in front of your eyes. Let's defeat the Jr. Balrog.

While talking to Mu Young, you were suddenly transported to a foreign place and a Jr. Balrog appeared right in front of your eyes. As soon as you defeated the Jr. Balrog, Tristan's Spirit appeared. You were able to hear the story of his past life.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's go into Tristan's Tomb and talk to his spirit after defeating the Jr. Balrog.
Hmm, I don't know who the owner is, but it sure isn't me.

I'm very impressed! I can't believe you were able to defeat the illusory Jr. Balrog I created. That was awfully brave of you. There, there, don't be shocked. You and I live in different worlds, so there is no reason to be afraid of me.

My name is Tristan. I took my last breath here a few decades ago. Balrog and I both died here, but the force of Balrog could not be consumed by death. Manji, who was an ambitious young adventurer at the time, sealed the force of Balrog with the help of my spirit.

But as time passes, the power of the seal is getting weaker and weaker. Balrog, the Prince of Darkness, is going to reemerge any day now. Oh, young adventurer, please save Maple World from evil. Please.
I really don't know who this note belongs to.
